book.synopsis: Woolf’s first and most popular volume of essays. This collection has more than twenty-five selections, including such important statements as “Modern Fiction” and “The Modern Essay.” Edited and with an Introduction by Andrew McNeillie; Index.
book.title_long: The Common Reader: First Series, Annotated Edition
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.7495716908 Pounds, Width: 0.74 Inches
